actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage State unemployment insurance laws to establish a system under which workers may purchase insurance to cover the costs of health insurance during periods of unemployment.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to permit State unemployment insurance laws to establish a program under which individuals performing services covered under State law have the option of purchasing health insurance continuation benefits.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage State unemployment insurance laws to establish a system under which workers may purchase insurance to cover the costs of health insurance during periods of unemployment.
